document_data.name: ''Wand of Mage Armor''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Wands of mage armor''''' were [[enchanted]] [[wand]]s that held multiple charges of defensive spells unleashed upon command.
document_data.Description: ''Wands of mage armor'' were slender {{SI|1'3|'"|long=yes}} wands with sharp point and angular design. They were usually made using bone, [[ivory]], or [[wood]], yet fragile and kept in cases. and could count as as much as fifty.
document_data.Powers: Each of these wands held several charges of the ''[[mage armor]]'' spell that could be discharged at will using a wand's command word. Upon expenditure of a wand's last charge, it disintegrated.
document_data.Notable Owners:
*[[Bronnia Stonesplitter]], a [[gold dwarf]] [[wizard]], active ''circa'' [[1372 DR]].
*[[Nym (Icewind Dale)|Nym]], a [[drow]] proprietor of rare and magical goods who traveled [[Icewind Dale]] and [[Dorn's Deep]] in the late 13{{th}} and early 14{{th}} centuries [[DR]].
